snippet: The Jets hope that the veteran safety Yeremiah Bell, who was recommended by offensive coordinator Tony Sparano, can bring some stability to the team’s defense.
abstract: New York Jets are hoping that the veteran safety Yeremiah Bell, who was recommended by offensive coordinator Tony Sparano, can bring some stability to the team’s defense.
lead_paragraph: The Jets hope that the veteran safety Yeremiah Bell, who was recommended by offensive coordinator Tony Sparano, can bring some stability to the team’s defense.

headline.seo: Yeremiah Bell, New Jets Quarterback in Middle of Defense, Proves a Quick Study
headline.main: Offensive Coach Gives Defense a Lift
headline.print_headline: Offensive Coordinator Gives the Defense a Lift
